section.title: Hierarchy Viewer
section.para: The Hierarchy View _perspective_ allows you to visualize the View hierarchy of your Android application and helps you to identify unnecessary layers in this hierarchy.

You can open the _Hierarchy View_ via
Window Open Perspective Other... Hierarchy View
In the Windows view you can select the process for which you want to analyze the view hierarchy.

textobject.phrase: Hierarchy Viewer for selecting the process

section.para: The currently active layout is analyzed and displayed.

The Tree View view show three light bulbs for the views. The first one indicates the time for calculating the size of the view, the second one indicates the time for creating the layout and the third one for drawing the view. Performance intensive work is indicated with the yellow or red color.
